metadata.name: Spica - 3/12
metadata.description:
1 of 12.

Digital painting made with Procreate.

This token is bound to a sublimation printing on aluminum that will be shipped for free to the buyer. The dimensions of the physical artwork are 123cm x 100cm.

The sublimation print will be forever attached to this NFT. To ensure this agreement a contract must be signed between the buyer and the Gallery.

If you have any questions you can contact us through our website https://www.vitruvius-gallery.art/

Spica is the brightest object in the constellation of Virgo and one of the 20 brightest stars in the night sky.

“He was there alone with himself, collected, tranquil, adoring, comparing the serenity of his heart with the serenity of the skies, moved in the darkness by the visible splendors of the constellations, and the invisible splendor of God, opening his soul to the thoughts which fall from the Unknown.”

― Victor Hugo, Les misérables.
